main event: Multiple observers reported a disc-shaped object moving across the sky in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil on May 7, 1952.
interesting points: The object was described as metallic and flying at a high rate of speed., The sighting was made in clear skies with few clouds., The sighting was documented by the United States Embassy in Rio de Janeiro., 5 photographs were taken related to the sighting., The sighting lasted approximately 5 minutes.
